member.name: D3D12_VERSIONED_ROOT_SIGNATURE_DESC
member.summary: Holds any version of a root signature description, and is designed to be used with serialization/deserialization functions.

member.name: D3D12_VERSIONED_ROOT_SIGNATURE_DESC.Version
member.summary: Specifies one member of D3D_ROOT_SIGNATURE_VERSION that determines the contents of the union.
